bestBHT.bht: Peter stands outside the door, prevented from entering where Jesus is. The presence of a female doorkeeper was not uncommon among the Jews. If only Peter had heeded the providential hint and refrained from going further, it would have been better for him. Yet, his curiosity led him to this point, where he waits for the other disciple to open the door and let him in. It is a simple and natural circumstance, with Peter teetering on the edge of danger and denial.
